lead_paragraph: The trial of Officer Caesar R. Goodson Jr. has another scheduling obstacle, an appeals court set March 4 for oral arguments for another officer who is trying to avoid testifying.

headline.print_headline: Maryland: Trial in Freddie Gray Death Is Complicated by Appeals Schedule
headline.main: Maryland: Trial in Freddie Gray Death Complicated by Appeals Schedule

snippet: The trial of Officer Caesar R. Goodson Jr. has another scheduling obstacle, an appeals court set March 4 for oral arguments for another officer who is trying to avoid testifying.
abstract: Scheduling of trial of Baltimore Police Officer Caesar R Goodson Jr, who has been charged with murder in death of Freddie Gray, runs into another obstacle due to appeals court ruling that trial cannot go forward until it hears appeal of Officer William G Porter, who also faces charges related to Gray's death.
